title: Self-sovereign identity system: Blockchain-based tech for easy identity verification and non-forgeable do... - Economic Times
content: Self-sovereign identity system: Blockchain-based tech for easy identity verification and non-forgeable do...  Economic Times
description: On December 28, 2021, PM Narendra Modi awarded digital degrees to the students under the National Blockchain Project. However, these digital degrees developed in-house by IIT Kanpur are non-forgeable. Professor Manindra Agrawal, Department of CSE, IIT Kanpur, explains how the self-sovereign identity system can ease issues like certification, verification and eliminate forgery of identity using blockchain technology.
